  • Method Details

    • getBannedCoordinates

      protected List<Cordinate> getBannedCoordinates()
      Description copied from class: ShipBoard
      Returns a list of Cordinate objects that are banned for component placement on this shipboard. This method must be implemented by concrete subclasses to define mode-specific banned areas.
      Specified by:
      getBannedCoordinates in class ShipBoard
      Returns:
      A List of banned Cordinates.

    • drawShipboard

      public void drawShipboard()
      Description copied from class: ShipBoard
      Placeholder method for drawing the shipboard, intended for GUI implementations. Concrete subclasses or external rendering classes would implement this.
      Overrides:
      drawShipboard in class ShipBoard
